summary: "The Evil Dead" is a scary movie from 1981 about five friends who go on a trip to a cabin in the woods. They find a tape that releases evil spirits, and four of them get possessed. Ash, the main character, has to fight to survive against these demons. The movie was made by Sam Raimi and his friends with a small budget, and it became really popular. It made a lot of money and is now seen as a classic horror movie. It even started a whole series of movies, TV shows, and games.
title: The Evil Dead
